start.description: You wake up to another sunny day in your peaceful suburban neighborhood. Across the street lives @[]'s mother, known for her charm, elegance and large breasts.

wtf_start.description: What the fuck is wrong with you? You sit down and continue your pathetic existence.

cig_outside.description: You step outside onto your back porch and pull out a tasty preroll, smoke hits your lungs and you are happy.

woods_intro.description: You decide to go for a walk in the woods, you see nothing but trees and bushes in front and around you.

turn_back.description: You head back home before it gets too late in the day

window.description: From your window, you see her tending to their garden. She seems approachable and friendly.

clean_window.description: You decide to clean your window with a bottle of Windex® for an unbeatable, streak-free shine!

kitchen.description: In the kitchen, you ponder over making a move. Maybe something to share with @[]'s mother?

baking.description: You decide to bake some cookies. The aroma of success fills your house.

coffee.description: You brew a fresh pot of coffee. It smells like success.

outside.description: Outside, you strike up a conversation about her garden as she works. She smells like fresh Jasmine and Rose and smiles at you with her beautiful eyes and a gorgeous rack.

give_cookies.description: You take the cookies over to @[]'s mother. She's pleasantly surprised and invites you inside for a chat.

invite_coffee.description: You invite @[]'s mother over for coffee. She accepts and seems excited to visit.

compliment_garden.description: She appreciates your compliment and shares some gardening tips with you. You listen to her with a smile on your face, you aren't paying attention but she doesn't know that.

ask_day.description: She talks about her day and seems to enjoy the company. You continue to plan your approach.

help_garden.description: You spend some time helping in the garden with @[]'s mother. It's a non-chalant way to get to know each other better.

offer_dinner.description: @[]'s mother is delighted by your offer and agrees to come over to your place for dinner.

inside_chat.description: Inside, you brew some coffee and have a warm, friendly chat with her over some cookies.

coffee_chat.description: You have a lovely time chatting over coffee with @[]'s mother. You both share stories and laugh.

cook_dinner.description: You cook a wonderful dinner for @[]'s mother. The evening is filled with good food, great conversation and a spark of romance in the air.

order_takeout.description: You order some takeout with @[]'s mother. You're both having a good time.

garden_cookies.description: You both enjoy the cookies in her beautifully tended garden, surrounded by the fragrance of flowers.. or is that her? God, she smells so good.

coffee_walk.description: Taking a stroll with your coffee, you both enjoy the pleasant neighborhood and engaging conversation.

garden_tour.description: She gives you a tour of her garden, explaining the different plants and flowers with enthusiasm. You couldn't care less but you can't screw this chance up.

casual_walk.description: You both enjoy a casual walk, sharing stories, enjoying the fresh air and enjoying each other's company.

cook_together.description: Cooking together turns out to be a fun and intimate, creating a delicious meal together.

board_game.description: You play a board game, enjoying the competitive yet friendly atmosphere.

brag_game.description: You brag at how good you are. You keep insisting that she is a horrible player and keep degrading her. She doesn't seem to be amused, she stares at you with disgust.

apologise_brag.description: You immediately apologise, you didn't mean it to come out like that. She reluctantly agrees to continue the night.

suggest_movie.description: You suggest watching a movie together, and she happily agrees.

stargazing.description: The night sky is clear, perfect for stargazing. You both lie back in her backyard and look at the stars.

card_game.description: You play a card game, filled with laughter and playful banter.

favorite_flowers.description: She talks about her favorite flowers and the stories behind them, showing a more personal side.

talk_interests.description: You share your interests and hobbies, finding common ground and sparking intriguing conversations.

life_experiences.description: She shares stories from her past, revealing depth and resilience. You're captivated by her experiences.

show_interest.description: Your genuine interest in her garden brings a smile to her face, and she opens up more about her passion.

open_up.description: Opening up about your life, you share personal stories and aspirations, creating a deeper connection.

listen_stories.description: You listen intently to her stories, finding them engaging and revealing a lot about her personality.

compliment_cooking.description: You compliment her cooking skills, and she blushes with pride, pleased by your recognition.

share_story.description: You share a personal story, revealing a more vulnerable side of yourself. She listens attentively.

compliment_strategy.description: You compliment her strategic skills in the game, sparking a playful debate about tactics.

movie_choice.description: You pick a movie together, finding common interests in film genres and themes.

constellations.description: You talk about constellations, sharing knowledge and stories about the stars.

new_game.description: You teach her a new card game, enjoying the challenge and excitement of learning something new together.

inquire_plants.description: You express curiosity about the various plants in her garden. She's delighted to share her knowledge and passion.

offer_help.description: Offering to help @[]'s mum in her garden, you find yourselves in a serene environment. Your close proximity and shared task open up an opportunity for subtle romantic gestures.

mention_gardening.description: Your shared interest in gardening sparks a lively conversation. You sense a bond forming over shared experiences.

movie.description: The movie ends, leaving both of you in a reflective mood. You sense a deepening connection.

enjoy_meal.description: The meal is delightful, filled with laughter and shared stories. The evening seems to bring you closer.

share_laugh.description: Your laughter creates a light-hearted and joyful atmosphere, making the evening feel special.

share_thoughts.description: You share your thoughts under the starry sky, creating an intimate moment of understanding and closeness.

compliment_play.description: Your compliment on her play style brings a blush to her cheeks. There's a playful, flirtatious air between you.

share_plants.description: You talk about your favorite plants, sharing personal stories linked to them. It adds a personal touch to the conversation.

admire_insights.description: Your admiration for her insights leads to a deeper discussion. She's visibly flattered and more open.

personal_dream.description: Sharing your personal dream brings a new level of intimacy to your conversation. She listens intently, clearly moved.

share_experience.description: Your shared experiences create a sense of empathy and understanding. The conversation feels more meaningful.

empathy.description: You offer a word of empathy to @[]'s mum, touching on the complexities and challenges of adult life. She seems touched by your understanding and opens up more about her experiences.

gardening_challenges.description: You ask @[]'s mum about the challenges she faces in gardening. She laughs and shares a few funny stories about her gardening misadventures, creating a light-hearted and intimate atmosphere.

her_aspirations.description: Curious about her deeper aspirations, you ask @[]'s mum about her dreams and goals. She reflects thoughtfully, revealing her desire for companionship and new experiences.

share_gardening.description: You share your own gardening experiences with @[]'s mum, discussing the joys and pitfalls of nurturing plants. She listens intently, clearly interested in your stories.

listen_stories.description: As @[]'s mum shares her stories, you find yourself engrossed in the vivid details of her life. Her tales are a mix of adventure, humor, and the wisdom gained from experience.

compliment_cooking.description: Impressed by her culinary skills, you compliment @[]'s mum on the delicious meal. She beams with pride and you sense an opportunity to deepen your connection.

share_story.description: You decide to share a personal story with @[]'s mum, revealing a part of your life that few people know. She listens attentively, her eyes reflecting a mix of curiosity and empathy.

compliment_strategy.description: You playfully tease @[]'s mum about her strategic prowess in the game. The air crackles with flirtatious energy as you suggest a more intimate 'rematch' later.

movie_choice.description: As the movie starts, you and @[]'s mum cozy up on the couch. The dim light and the emotional movie set a romantic tone, drawing you closer together.

constellations.description: Under the starlit sky, you point out constellations to @[]'s mum. The romantic ambiance and the beauty of the night deepen your connection, inviting a closer embrace.

thoughtful_compliment.description: You offer @[]'s mum a thoughtful compliment that touches her deeply, sparking a blush and a deeper emotional connection.

laugh_anecdotes.description: Her funny anecdotes leave you laughing heartily, creating a lively and flirtatious atmosphere between you and @[]'s mum.

comment_experience.description: Your insightful comments on her experiences show your deep understanding, drawing you closer to @[]'s mum.

cook_again.description: Suggesting to cook together again, you ignite a spark of anticipation in @[]'s mum, hinting at more intimate gatherings in the future.

recipe_idea.description: Sharing your recipe idea, you find a moment of shared passion with @[]'s mum, stirring a mix of culinary and romantic excitement.

private_rematch.description: You suggest a private rematch to @[]'s mum, your tone playful yet hinting at more. She catches the suggestion, her eyes twinkling with interest.

flirty_game_talk.description: Discussing other games with a wink, you keep the conversation light yet filled with innuendo, keeping @[]'s mum engaged and smiling.

forward_comment.description: You make a comment that's a bit too forward, and @[]'s mum raises an eyebrow, clearly taken aback Sby the sudden shift in tone.

romantic_comment.description: As a romantic scene unfolds on screen, you comment softly, drawing @[]'s mum closer into an intimate conversation about love and relationships.

intimate_movie.description: Suggesting a more intimate movie, you gauge @[]'s mum's reaction. She seems intrigued by the idea, a hint of curiosity in her eyes.

arm_around.description: Casually, you wrap an arm around @[]'s mum. She leans into your embrace, the warmth between you growing as the movie continues.

exchange_books.description: You suggest exchanging gardening books. She agrees, and you both head to your respective houses. When you return, you're carrying a book titled 'Gardening on Mars: The Red Planet Green Thumb Guide'. She raises an eyebrow, clearly amused by your unconventional choice.

propose_martian_garden.description: You excitedly propose starting a Martian garden as your next project. She looks at you bewildered, wondering if you're serious about gardening in space suits.

insist_on_martian_garden.description: You insist on the feasibility of Martian gardening, even suggesting a space-themed garden party. She quickly realizes you're not joking, gives a polite smile, and swiftly changes the topic, clearly not on board with the interstellar idea.

laugh_off_martian_garden.description: Seeing her confused expression, you laugh it off as a joke. She gives a relieved chuckle and suggests sticking to more terrestrial gardening topics.

discuss_earth_gardening.description: Deciding not to venture into cosmic horticulture, you discuss your favorite earthbound plants and gardening techniques. She seems genuinely interested, and the conversation flows smoothly.

share_gardening_tips.description: You exchange practical gardening tips, bonding over your shared love for horticulture.

suggest_exotic_plants.description: Getting carried away, you suggest importing exotic, carnivorous plants. Your enthusiasm wanes as she looks horrified at the idea of man-eating plants in her peaceful garden.

plan_a_garden_visit.description: You plan a visit to a local botanical garden to get more inspiration for your earthly green spaces.

propose_costume_theme.description: In a burst of excitement, you propose making the garden visit a costume event, dressing up as famous botanists. She pauses, unsure if you're serious, then politely declines, citing a sudden 'busy schedule'.

gardener_joke.description: You make a playful joke about becoming her personal gardener, complete with an exaggerated bow and a flourish of an imaginary hat. She laughs, but you can tell she's unsure if you're serious.

double_down_on_joke.description: You double down on the gardener joke, asking her repeatedly if she needs any yard work done or if anyone she knows does. She chuckles uncomfortably, quickly excuses herself to 'check on something inside', leaving you alone with your thoughts.

clarify_just_a_joke.description: Realizing the joke might have been a bit much, you quickly clarify that it was just a playful comment. She sighs in relief, and the conversation shifts back to more comfortable territory.

gentle_touch.description: You offer a gentle touch to assist her in the garden, reaching out as if to guide her hand. However, you dramatically miss and end up gently caressing a nearby garden gnome instead.

apologize_for_gnome_incident.description: Realizing your misstep, you quickly apologize for the accidental gnome caress. She bursts into laughter, finding the situation amusingly awkward. The mood lightens, but you decide to keep your hands to yourself for now.

pretend_gnome_intentional.description: You decide to pretend that caressing the gnome was intentional, and decide to make a joke about making love to the gnome. She raises an eyebrow, and says she left her washing in the washing machine and walks away abruptly.

personal_reflection.description: As the credits roll, you lean closer, sharing a deep and somewhat sultry reflection inspired by the movie. Your attempt at sounding profound, however, comes off as confusingly abstract.
As the credits roll, you lean closer, sharing a deep and somewhat sultry reflection inspired by the movie. Your attempt at sounding profound, however, comes off as confusingly abstract.

add_flirtatious_twist.description: Seizing the moment, you add a flirtatious twist to your reflection, suggesting a personal reenactment of the movie's steamy scene. She seems intrigued, her eyes sparkling with a mix of amusement and curiosity.

play_movie_characters.description: You propose playing characters from the movie, each taking on a sultry role. She leans in, excited by the idea, and you start discussing who would play which character, the air charged with playful anticipation.

daring_bet.description: You up the ante with a daring bet related to the movie's plot, promising a tantalizing reward for the winner. She giggles, clearly enjoying the risqué turn of the evening.

start_role_play.description: You both start role-playing, immersing yourselves in the characters. The room fills with laughter and flirtatious banter, bringing the movie's romance to life.

escalate_role_play.description: As the role play intensifies, the atmosphere becomes charged with excitement and desire. The evening takes a decidedly steamy turn, bringing you both closer in an unexpected but thrilling way.

cool_down.description: Sensing things might be moving too fast, you decide to cool things down a bit. You both appreciate the fun you've had and agree to meet again soon.

get_cold_feet_and_cancel.description: Nervous about the costume idea, you decide to cancel. She understands, but there's a hint of disappointment in her voice.

raise_stakes.description: Raising the stakes, the game takes a daring turn. The tension and excitement grow, leading to a night filled with unexpected and sensual moments.

relax_after_game.description: After the game, you both decide to relax and unwind. The excitement of the game transitions into comfortable and intimate conversations.

proceed_reward.description: You proceed with the reward, which leads to an intimate and memorable moment between you two, marking the evening as uniquely special.

visit_lounge.description: You decide to visit a nearby lounge, where the ambiance is perfect for continuing the evening in a more relaxed and intimate setting.

suggest_break.description: Realizing things might be getting too intense, you suggest taking a break. She agrees, and you both relax, chatting amiably about lighter topics.

prepare_costumes.description: Excitedly, you both decide to prepare costumes to enhance the role-playing experience. She's all in for the fun, and you set a date for this adventurous evening.

bet_game.description: You play the bet game, each teasing and playfully competing. The game becomes an excuse for flirtation and witty banter, making the night more thrilling.

keep_it_light.description: You keep the game light and playful, enjoying the fun without pushing too far. The evening remains enjoyable and flirty, striking a comfortable balance.

reveal_reward.description: You reveal the reward, something delightfully intimate and exciting. She blushes, both surprised and intrigued, making the game even more enticing.

funny_anecdote.description: Seeing the confusion, you quickly switch to a funny anecdote related to the movie. She laughs, the tension dissipating as you both enjoy a lighter moment.

suggest_change_of_scene.description: You suggest changing the scene, perhaps going for a late-night walk or visiting a nearby lounge. She's receptive to the idea, eager for a change of pace.

suggest_another_movie.description: Feeling the moment might be too forward, you retract and suggest watching another movie. She agrees, perhaps a little disappointed, but the mood remains light and pleasant.

next_level.description: You decide to take things to the next level, and the evening evolves into a passionate and unforgettable experience, deepening your connection.

daring_adventure.description: Feeling adventurous, you propose an unexpected but thrilling activity. She's excited by the idea, and you both head out for a spontaneous night-time adventure.

intimate_conversations.description: You engage in deep, intimate conversations, sharing secrets and desires. The connection between you deepens, making the evening more meaningful.

something_wild.description: In a bold move, you suggest something utterly wild and out of the ordinary. She laughs, finding the idea amusing but a bit too much, and suggests keeping things a bit more grounded.

slow_down.description: You decide to slow things down a bit, not wanting to rush the moment. It turns out to be the right move, as you both enjoy a more relaxed yet still intimate end to the evening.

plan_date.description: You discuss plans for another date, both excited about the prospect of continuing to explore your connection.

embrace_moment.description: Embracing the moment, you both indulge in the heightened excitement, creating a night that neither of you will forget anytime soon.

reflect_evening.description: You take a moment to reflect on the evening, sharing thoughts and feelings about the night's events. It's a warm, intimate conversation that brings you even closer.

enjoy_lounge.description: At the lounge, you both enjoy the ambiance, with soft music and dim lights setting the perfect mood for deep conversations and shared laughs.

watch_comedy.description: You pick a comedy, and the rest of the evening is filled with laughter and light-hearted moments, providing a nice balance to the earlier intensity.

set_date.description: You both agree on a date and time for your next meeting, excited about the possibility of continuing the adventure.

leave_open_ended.description: You leave the date plans open-ended, agreeing to get in touch when the time feels right. There's a sense of mystery and anticipation in the air.

enjoy_adventure.description: The spontaneous adventure turns out to be exhilarating. You explore the city at night, discovering hidden gems and sharing laughs along the way.

quiet_place_talk.description: You find a quiet, romantic spot to talk. The conversation flows easily, and you both share personal stories, feeling a deeper connection.

life_and_dreams.description: Over drinks, you delve into discussions about life, dreams, and ambitions. It's a meaningful exchange that brings you closer.

propose_dance.description: You propose a dance, and she agrees. The dance floor provides a perfect, intimate setting for you to connect physically and emotionally.

continue_dance.description: You continue dancing, lost in the music and each other. The connection between you grows with every song, making for a memorable evening.

funny_stories.description: You share funny life stories, laughing together and enjoying the lighter side of life.

more_funny_stories.description: You continue sharing hilarious stories, each one more amusing than the last. The laughter creates a bond that's both joyful and genuine.

favorite_comedians.description: You discuss your favorite comedians, sharing clips and jokes. It's a fun way to learn more about each other's humor and personalities.

exchange_contacts.description: You exchange contact information, promising to share more funny clips and jokes. There's an unspoken promise of more fun interactions to come.

plan_comedy_show.description: You make plans to catch a comedy show together. It's an exciting prospect, and you both look forward to sharing more laughs.

send_funny_message.description: You send her a funny message the next day, keeping the light-hearted vibe going. She responds with laughter, and the conversation flows naturally.

set_show_date.description: You set a date for the comedy show. Both of you are excited about the plan and the chance to spend more time together.

plan_date.description: You discuss plans for another date, both excited about the prospect of continuing to explore your connection.

slots_intro.description: You suggest going to the casino, she reluctantly agrees and you call a taxi to take you both out to the city.

casino_bar1.description: You both sit down at the bar, {}'s mum looks at you waiting for you to order her a drink.

outdoor_adventure.description: You suggest an outdoor adventure, like hiking or biking. She seems excited by the idea of exploring nature together.

cooking_class.description: A cooking class could be fun, learning a new cuisine together. She likes the idea of creating something delicious as a team.

live_music.description: You bring up the idea of attending a live music event. She's enthusiastic about the idea of enjoying music together.

wine_tasting.description: Mentioning a wine tasting event piques her interest. It sounds like a sophisticated and enjoyable way to spend an evening.

set_date.description: You both agree on a date and time for your next meeting, excited about the possibility of continuing the adventure.

casual_hangout.description: You casually mention the idea of hanging out after your date, keeping it light. She seems open to it but prefers to see how the date goes first.

post_date_activities.description: You suggest specific activities for after the date, like a walk or a visit to a nearby café. She's intrigued and agrees to decide after the date.

joke_epic_night.description: You joke about the potential for an epic night together. She laughs, enjoying your humor, and the mood remains light and playful.

pick_trail.description: You pick a specific hiking trail known for its breathtaking views. She's excited about the idea of a scenic hike together.

finalize_hike.description: You finalize your hiking plans, setting a date and time. The anticipation of a day spent in nature adds a spark to your conversation.

post_hike_dinner.description: You suggest having dinner together after the hike. She loves the idea of ending the day with a nice meal.

cozy_restaurant.description: You decide on a cozy restaurant for your post-hike dinner. The plans for the day seem perfect, and she's clearly looking forward to it.

cook_dinner.description: You offer to cook dinner at your place after the hike. She's pleasantly surprised by the gesture and agrees.

her_place.description: You suggest, with a hint of flirtation, that maybe it would be more fun to have dinner at her place. She seems intrigued but wants to make sure you're both on the same page.

discuss_dinner.description: You discuss the idea of dinner at her place, keeping the conversation light yet flirtatious. She's enjoying the banter, but also wants to keep things somewhat unpredictable.

movie_after_dinner.description: You playfully suggest watching a movie after dinner, hinting at a relaxed and cozy evening. She smiles at the idea, but playfully counters with a suggestion for a board game instead.

direct_intentions.description: You're direct about your intentions, making it clear you're hoping for more than just dinner. She appreciates your honesty but decides it's a bit too forward for her taste.

public_place.description: Sensing her hesitation, you back off and suggest going to a public place instead. She's relieved and agrees to the change of plans.

insist_movie.description: You insist on watching a movie, but she's not convinced. The mood shifts slightly, and she suggests rescheduling for another time.

go_out.description: You suggest going out instead, and she quickly agrees. A change of scenery might be just what you both need.

casual_dinner.description: You apologize for being too forward and suggest a more casual dinner. She's glad for the change of pace and looks forward to a relaxed evening.

simple_menu.description: You both plan a simple menu for your dinner, keeping things light and easy. The evening is set to be comfortable and enjoyable.

stalking_intro.description: Feeling a twisted curiosity, you grab your military-grade binoculars and settle by the window. Your heart races as you adjust the focus, bringing your neighbor’s yard into clear view. She’s tending to her garden, her movements graceful and unguarded.

stalking_deeper.description: You decide to keep watching, feeling a strange mix of excitement and guilt. She’s oblivious to your prying eyes as she hums a tune and waters her flowers. Just then, she pauses and looks up, as if sensing your gaze. You freeze, barely daring to breathe.

duck_quickly.description: You duck down quickly, your heart pounding in your chest. After a moment, you cautiously peek over the windowsill. She’s gone back to her gardening, seemingly unaware of your presence.

stay_still.description: You stay as still as possible, barely breathing. She looks around for a moment, then shrugs and returns to her work. You let out a sigh of relief, but the guilt gnaws at you.

resume_watching.description: You resume watching, this time more carefully. She continues tending to her garden, and you can’t help but admire her dedication and beauty. However, the longer you watch, the more the guilt grows.

watch_even_longer.description: You push the guilt aside and keep watching. As the sun sets, she finishes up and goes inside. You put down the binoculars, feeling a mix of shame and longing.

attempt_speak.description: Summoning all your courage, you decide to go outside and try to speak to her. As you approach her house, you rehearse what you’re going to say in your mind. Your heart races as you reach her front door.

door_knock.description: You knock on the door, your palms sweating. After a few moments, she opens the door and looks at you with a friendly, yet puzzled expression.

nervous_intro.description: You stammer an introduction, feeling incredibly awkward. To your surprise, she frowns and begins to close the door, but you wedge your foot in, desperate to keep talking.

garden_compliment.description: You blurt out a compliment about her garden. She looks at you suspiciously and tells you to leave, but you feel a twisted determination to keep engaging her.

push_inside.description: Ignoring her protests, you push your way inside her house. She yells for you to leave, panic evident in her voice.

insist_talk.description: You insist on talking more, ignoring her discomfort. She threatens to call the police, but you feel an irrational need to stay.

calm_down_attempt.description: You try to calm her down, speaking in soothing tones, but she is terrified and reaches for her phone to call for help.

grab_phone.description: You grab her phone from her hand, preventing her from calling for help. The situation has spiraled out of control, and you feel a dark thrill from the power you hold.

plead_listen.description: You plead with her to listen, but she is beyond frightened and screams for help. Neighbors are likely to hear and come to her aid.

demand_listen.description: You demand she listens to you, but her fear only intensifies. The reality of what you've done starts to hit you.

silence_her.description: In a panic, you try to silence her, covering her mouth with your hand. Her muffled screams and terrified eyes haunt you.

control_her.description: You try to assert control over her, but the situation is beyond saving. She is terrified and unresponsive to your attempts to calm her.

explain_while_silencing.description: You try to explain yourself while keeping her silent, but your words make no sense in the madness of the situation.

realize_horror.description: The full horror of your actions hits you, and you realize there is no way to undo what you've done.

hold_and_hope.description: You hold her tightly, hoping she will calm down, but her fear only grows. The sound of sirens in the distance signals that your time is up.

control_further.description: You try to control the situation further, but it spirals even more out of control. The police are on their way.

accept_fate.description: You accept the inevitable consequences of your actions. The police arrive, and you are arrested. The reality of your choices crashes down on you.

wtf_start.description: What the fuck is wrong with you? You sit down and continue your pathetic existence.

desperate_start.description: In a haze of desperation, you stumble outside and head towards your neighbor's house. Your mind races with irrational thoughts of confessing your feelings.

knock_door_desperate.description: You knock on her door, your heart pounding in your chest. She opens the door, looking surprised and somewhat concerned.

wait_outside.description: You decide to wait outside her house, hoping to catch a glimpse of her. Hours pass, and you start feeling more anxious and desperate.

leave_note.description: You scribble a desperate, creepy note and leave it on her door. The note contains your contact information and an unsettling confession of your feelings.

confess_feelings.description: You blurt out a desperate confession of your feelings. She looks shocked and uncomfortable, taking a step back.

ask_trivial.description: You try to act normal and ask for something trivial, like a cup of sugar. She hesitates but decides to help, sensing your unease.

wait_longer.description: You continue waiting outside, your anxiety growing with each passing minute. Eventually, a neighbor notices your suspicious behavior.

watch_reaction_note.description: You hide nearby, watching for her reaction to the note. She eventually finds it, reads it, and looks horrified. She quickly goes back inside, clearly disturbed.

plead_understand.description: You plead for her to understand your feelings, but your desperation only makes her more frightened. She threatens to call the police.

push_inside.description: Ignoring her protests, you try to force your way inside her house. She screams and struggles against you.

continue_conversation_trivial.description: You try to continue the conversation, but your nervousness and desperation make her increasingly uneasy.

explain_waiting.description: You try to explain your presence to the neighbor, but your explanation only raises more suspicion.

wait_contact.description: You wait, hoping she will contact you despite her horrified reaction. Days pass with no word, and you feel increasingly isolated and desperate.

convince_harmless.description: You try to convince her that you're harmless, but she doesn't believe you. The situation is rapidly escalating.

realize_and_stop.description: Realizing the horror of your actions, you stop and step back. She quickly shuts the door, and you hear her calling the police.

continue_forcing.description: You continue forcing your way inside. She screams and struggles, and you hear sirens in the distance.

ask_inside.description: You nervously ask if you can come inside. She looks extremely uncomfortable and refuses, telling you to leave.

explain_further.description: You try to explain further, but the neighbor is not convinced and calls the police.

leave_another_note.description: You leave another, even more desperate note. Her response is even more disturbed, and she contacts the authorities.

try_in_person.description: You try to see her in person again, but she has already reported you to the police. You are confronted by law enforcement.

face_consequences.description: You decide to face the consequences of your actions. The police arrive and arrest you. The weight of your desperation crashes down on you.

wait_police.description: You wait for the police to arrive, resigned to face the consequences of your actions. They arrest you, and you are left to reflect on your desperation.

wait_confront.description: You wait to be confronted by the authorities. When they arrive, they arrest you, and you are taken away to face the consequences of your actions.

explain_to_police.description: You try to explain yourself to the police, but your desperation and erratic behavior make things worse. You are arrested and taken away.

woods_intro.description: You decide to go for a walk in the woods, you see nothing but trees and bushes in front and around you.

turn_back.description: You decide to turn back and head home before it gets too late. The woods can be dangerous at night.

straight_1.description: You keep walking straight, the trees growing denser around you. The path ahead is unclear, and you feel a chill in the air.

left_1.description: You veer off to the left, noticing a small stream. The sound of running water is calming.

right_1.description: You veer off to the right, noticing a rocky path leading uphill. The climb looks challenging but intriguing.

log_1.description: You sit down on a log to relax. The forest is quiet, and you start to feel a sense of peace.

deeper_woods.description: You walk deeper into the woods. The trees are so dense now that they block out most of the sunlight. You start to feel uneasy.

follow_stream.description: You follow the stream, enjoying the sound of the water. After a while, you see a small clearing up ahead.

stream_relax.description: You sit by the stream, listening to the water and enjoying the peaceful atmosphere.

climb_rocks.description: You climb the rocky path, each step feeling more treacherous than the last. At the top, you see a breathtaking view of the forest below.

explore_area.description: You explore the surrounding area, finding interesting plants and rocks. You feel a strange sense of being watched.

relax_longer.description: You decide to relax longer, enjoying the calmness of the woods. Suddenly, you hear a rustling in the bushes.

fall_asleep.description: You fall asleep on the log, the forest sounds lulling you into a deep sleep. You wake up hours later, disoriented and lost.

deeper_dark.description: You push forward into the dark, dense forest. The air feels thick and heavy.

gather_thoughts.description: You sit down to gather your thoughts. The forest seems to close in around you.

think_longer.description: You continue sitting and thinking, feeling more and more isolated.

admire_view.description: You admire the view, feeling a brief moment of peace.

explore_top.description: You explore the top of the rocky path, finding interesting plants and stones. You notice a faint trail leading deeper into the woods.

ignore_feeling.description: You ignore the feeling of being watched and keep exploring. Suddenly, you hear a noise behind you.

investigate_noise.description: You decide to investigate the noise. You carefully approach the bushes and find a small animal trapped.

listen_noise.description: You stay still and listen. The noise gets louder, and you realize something is approaching.

lost_woods.description: You wander aimlessly, the forest seeming to shift and change around you. You start to panic as you realize you are completely lost.

stay_lost.description: You decide to stay put, hoping someone will find you. Hours pass, and you feel increasingly desperate.

wait_longer_lost.description: You wait longer, the forest growing darker. You hear distant sounds but can't identify them.

give_up_lost.description: You give up and lie down, feeling the weight of your exhaustion. You drift into a restless sleep.

call_out_lost.description: You call out for help, hoping someone will hear you. Your voice echoes through the forest.

stay_quiet_lost.description: You decide to stay quiet, conserving your energy. The forest feels oppressive.

lost_further.description: You wander deeper into the woods, the trees closing in around you. You feel a growing sense of dread.

trail_wizard.description: You follow the faint trail, feeling a strange pull guiding you forward. The trees seem to whisper around you.

turn_around_noise.description: You turn around quickly, but see nothing. The forest is eerily quiet.

keep_walking_noise.description: You keep walking, trying to shake off the feeling of being watched. The noise seems to follow you.

run_away_noise.description: You run away, your heart pounding in your chest. You don't stop until you're back on the main path.

confront_noise.description: You turn around and confront whatever is following you. To your surprise, it's a strange old man who looks like a wizard.

help_animal.description: You help the small animal, freeing it from the trap. It looks at you gratefully before scampering off.

ignore_animal.description: You ignore the animal and keep walking. The forest feels more oppressive.

defend_noise.description: You prepare to defend yourself, but nothing happens. The noise stops, and the forest is silent.

call_out_noise.description: You call out to see who it is, but there's no response. The forest feels even more eerie.

find_wizard.description: You finally find the source of the strange feeling – an old wizard standing in a clearing. He looks at you with a knowing smile.

rest_trail.description: You sit down to rest on the faint trail. The forest feels alive around you.

catch_breath.description: You stop and catch your breath. The forest is quiet again.

follow_animal.description: You follow the animal, which seems to lead you through the forest. Eventually, you reach a small clearing where an old wizard stands.

thank_animal.description: You thank the animal, which nods and disappears into the forest. The wizard looks at you with a kind smile.

wait_response.description: You wait for a response, but the forest is silent. The sense of isolation grows.

call_again.description: You call out again, your voice echoing through the trees. This time, you hear a faint reply.

follow_reply.description: You follow the sound of the reply, feeling a mix of hope and fear. You eventually find an old wizard in a clearing.

wizard_intro.description: The wizard introduces himself and offers you a love potion, claiming it will solve all your problems.

accept_potion.description: You accept the potion from the wizard. He gives you instructions on how to use it, warning you of the consequences.

ask_potion.description: You ask the wizard about the potion. He explains its effects and the risks involved.

ask_help.description: You ask the wizard for help. He offers you a love potion, claiming it will solve all your problems.

ask_consequences.description: You ask the wizard about the consequences of using the potion. He warns you that while it will make someone fall in love with you, it might come at a great personal cost.

ask_risks.description: You ask the wizard more about the risks. He tells you that the potion might bind the person to you in ways that could become dangerous.

follow_stream.description: You follow the stream, enjoying the sound of the water. After a while, you see a small clearing up ahead.

clearing_wizard.description: You enter the clearing and find an old wizard standing by a small fire. He looks at you with a knowing smile.

admire_view.description: You admire the view, feeling a brief moment of peace.

enjoy_view.description: You stay longer, enjoying the view. Suddenly, you feel a presence behind you.

give_up_lost.description: You give up and lie down, feeling the weight of your exhaustion. You drift into a restless sleep.

game_over_forrest.description: You don't wake up. The forest claims you as another lost soul.

lost_further.description: You wander deeper into the woods, the trees closing in around you. You feel a growing sense of dread.

lost_darker.description: The forest grows darker and more oppressive. You feel completely lost and hopeless.

confront_noise.description: You turn around and confront whatever is following you. To your surprise, it's a strange old man who looks like a wizard.

wait_wizard.description: You stay silent and wait. The wizard looks at you curiously and then speaks, offering you a love potion.

rest_trail.description: You sit down to rest on the faint trail. The forest feels alive around you.

rest_longer.description: You rest longer, feeling drowsy. As you close your eyes, you hear a rustling nearby.

lovepotion_start.description: Armed with the love potion, you head back home. The wizard's words echo in your mind as you approach your house, feeling a mix of excitement and trepidation.

love_example_window.description: You look out the window and see her tending to her garden. The sight of her stirs a deep longing within you.

love_example_prepare_drink.description: You prepare the potion in a drink, your hands shaking with anticipation. The mixture looks innocent enough, but you know its true power.

love_example_greet_with_potion.description: You walk outside with the drink, approaching her with a smile. She looks up and returns your smile warmly.

love_example_wait_inside.description: You wait inside, nervously watching the door. Finally, you see her approaching, and your heart races.

love_example_offer_drink.description: You offer her the drink, and she accepts it with a grateful smile. As she takes a sip, you watch with bated breath.

love_example_small_talk.description: You engage in small talk, your mind racing with the possibilities. She seems relaxed and enjoys your company.

love_example_invite_for_drink.description: You invite her in for a drink, and she accepts, stepping inside your house. The atmosphere feels charged with anticipation.

love_example_effects.description: As the potion takes effect, you notice a change in her demeanor. She looks at you with newfound affection and desire.

love_example_conversation.description: You engage her in conversation, feeling more confident as the potion works its magic. Her responses become increasingly affectionate.

love_example_embrace.description: You move closer and embrace her. She responds eagerly, her affection for you evident.

love_example_whisper.description: You whisper sweet words to her, and she blushes, leaning into your embrace.

love_example_private.description: You lead her inside for more privacy. The intimacy of the moment grows as you close the door behind you.

love_example_kiss.description: You kiss her passionately, and she responds with equal fervor. The potion has fully taken effect, and she is completely enamored with you.

love_example_living_room.description: You continue your intimate moment in the living room, the atmosphere charged with desire and affection.

love_example_bedroom.description: You lead her to the bedroom, where the intimacy of the moment reaches its peak. The night is filled with passion and love.

consider_robbery.description: While sipping your coffee, a wild and dangerous idea forms in your mind. What if you rob a bank to buy her something amazing and win her over?

talk_shady_friend.description: You meet up with a shady friend who has a reputation for knowing the underworld. He agrees to help you but warns you about the extreme risks involved.

plan_heist_with_help.description: With the help of your shady friend, you start planning the heist meticulously. The plan involves distraction, deception, and a quick escape.

plan_heist_alone.description: You decide to go ahead with the heist alone, not trusting anyone else to help. The risks are higher, but so is the potential reward.

acquire_disguise_with_help.description: Your shady friend helps you find a convincing disguise that will help you blend in and avoid detection. A ski mask, dark clothes, and gloves should do the trick.

acquire_disguise_alone.description: You find a convincing disguise that will help you blend in and avoid detection. A ski mask, dark clothes, and gloves should do the trick.

change_disguise_with_help.description: You decide to change your disguise at the last moment, hoping a different look will give you an edge. Your friend advises you on a new look.

change_disguise_alone.description: You decide to change your disguise at the last moment, hoping a different look will give you an edge.

map_bank_with_help.description: You and your shady friend map out the bank, noting the security cameras, guards, and escape routes. Every detail matters in this high-stakes game.

map_bank_alone.description: You map out the bank alone, noting the security cameras, guards, and escape routes. Every detail matters in this high-stakes game.

find_insider_with_help.description: Your shady friend finds an insider at the bank who is willing to help you for a cut of the money. They provide you with critical information about the bank's layout and security.

find_insider_alone.description: You find an insider at the bank who is willing to help you for a cut of the money. They provide you with critical information about the bank's layout and security.

get_weapon_with_help.description: Your shady friend helps you acquire a weapon for the heist, knowing it's necessary for intimidation and control. A gun adds a serious edge to your plan.

get_weapon_alone.description: You acquire a weapon for the heist, knowing it's necessary for intimidation and control. A gun adds a serious edge to your plan.

go_unarmed_with_help.description: You decide to go unarmed, hoping to rely on fear and intimidation alone. Your shady friend advises against it, but you are determined.

go_unarmed_alone.description: You decide to go unarmed, hoping to rely on fear and intimidation alone. It's a risky move, but it might pay off.

heist_day_with_help.description: The day of the heist arrives. You're nervous but determined. With your shady friend by your side, you put on your disguise, grab your weapon, and head to the bank. The adrenaline is pumping.

heist_day_alone.description: The day of the heist arrives. You're nervous but determined. You put on your disguise, grab your weapon, and head to the bank alone. The adrenaline is pumping.

heist_day_unarmed_with_help.description: The day of the heist arrives. You're nervous but determined. With your shady friend by your side, you put on your disguise and head to the bank, unarmed but confident.

heist_day_unarmed_alone.description: The day of the heist arrives. You're nervous but determined. You put on your disguise and head to the bank alone, unarmed but confident.

enter_bank_with_help.description: You enter the bank with your shady friend, your heart pounding. You pull out your weapon and demand everyone to get on the floor. The tellers comply, and you start collecting money. Tension is thick in the air.

enter_bank_alone.description: You enter the bank alone, your heart pounding. You pull out your weapon and demand everyone to get on the floor. The tellers comply, and you start collecting money. Tension is thick in the air.

enter_bank_unarmed_with_help.description: You enter the bank with your shady friend, your heart pounding. You shout at everyone to get on the floor, relying on fear and intimidation. The room falls silent as everyone complies.

enter_bank_unarmed_alone.description: You enter the bank alone, your heart pounding. You shout at everyone to get on the floor, relying on fear and intimidation. The room falls silent as everyone complies.

continue_heist_with_help.description: You continue with the heist, but things start to go wrong. A security guard tries to be a hero and lunges at you. In the struggle, your weapon goes off, and the guard falls to the ground. The situation spirals out of control.

continue_heist_alone.description: You continue with the heist alone, but things start to go wrong. A security guard tries to be a hero and lunges at you. In the struggle, your weapon goes off, and the guard falls to the ground. The situation spirals out of control.

continue_heist_unarmed_with_help.description: You continue with the heist, but things start to go wrong. A security guard tries to be a hero and tackles you. In the struggle, the alarm goes off. Chaos erupts.

continue_heist_unarmed_alone.description: You continue with the heist alone, but things start to go wrong. A security guard tries to be a hero and tackles you. In the struggle, the alarm goes off. Chaos erupts.

take_hostage_with_help.description: In a desperate move, you take a hostage to increase your chances of escape. The room is filled with fear as you hold the weapon against the hostage's head.

take_hostage_alone.description: In a desperate move, you take a hostage to increase your chances of escape. The room is filled with fear as you hold the weapon against the hostage's head.

take_hostage_unarmed_with_help.description: In a desperate move, you take a hostage to increase your chances of escape. The room is filled with fear as you use the hostage as leverage.

take_hostage_unarmed_alone.description: In a desperate move, you take a hostage to increase your chances of escape. The room is filled with fear as you use the hostage as leverage.

run_away_with_help.description: You and your shady friend run away from the bank, the sound of sirens growing louder. You manage to escape to your hideout but know it's only a matter of time before you're caught.

run_away_alone.description: You run away from the bank alone, the sound of sirens growing louder. You manage to escape to your hideout but know it's only a matter of time before you're caught.

run_away_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend run away from the bank, the sound of sirens growing louder. You manage to escape to your hideout but know it's only a matter of time before you're caught.

run_away_unarmed_alone.description: You run away from the bank alone, the sound of sirens growing louder. You manage to escape to your hideout but know it's only a matter of time before you're caught.

help_guard_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to help the guard, but it's too late. The police arrive, and you're arrested on the spot. The gravity of your actions hits you hard.

help_guard_alone.description: You try to help the guard, but it's too late. The police arrive, and you're arrested on the spot. The gravity of your actions hits you hard.

calm_guard_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to calm the guard, but the situation escalates. The police arrive, and you're arrested on the spot. The reality of your situation sets in.

calm_guard_alone.description: You try to calm the guard, but the situation escalates. The police arrive, and you're arrested on the spot. The reality of your situation sets in.

demand_car_with_help.description: You and your shady friend demand a getaway car, using the hostage as leverage. The police agree to your demands, but time is running out.

demand_car_alone.description: You demand a getaway car, using the hostage as leverage. The police agree to your demands, but time is running out.

demand_car_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend demand a getaway car, using the hostage as leverage. The police agree to your demands, but time is running out.

demand_car_unarmed_alone.description: You demand a getaway car, using the hostage as leverage. The police agree to your demands, but time is running out.

hostage_shield_with_help.description: You and your shady friend use the hostage as a shield, trying to make your way out of the bank. The tension is high, and any wrong move could be fatal.

hostage_shield_alone.description: You use the hostage as a shield, trying to make your way out of the bank. The tension is high, and any wrong move could be fatal.

hostage_shield_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend use the hostage as a shield, trying to make your way out of the bank. The tension is high, and any wrong move could be fatal.

hostage_shield_unarmed_alone.description: You use the hostage as a shield, trying to make your way out of the bank. The tension is high, and any wrong move could be fatal.

leave_town_with_help.description: You and your shady friend pack your things and prepare to leave town, hoping to start a new life far away from here. But the police are already on your trail. They catch you before you can escape.

leave_town_alone.description: You pack your things and prepare to leave town, hoping to start a new life far away from here. But the police are already on your trail. They catch you before you can escape.

leave_town_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend pack your things and prepare to leave town, hoping to start a new life far away from here. But the police are already on your trail. They catch you before you can escape.

leave_town_unarmed_alone.description: You pack your things and prepare to leave town, hoping to start a new life far away from here. But the police are already on your trail. They catch you before you can escape.

contact_friend_with_help.description: You contact another friend for help, but they betray you to the police.

contact_friend_alone.description: You contact a friend for help, but they betray you to the police.

contact_friend_unarmed_with_help.description: You contact another friend for help, but they betray you to the police.

contact_friend_unarmed_alone.description: You contact a friend for help, but they betray you to the police.

wait_car_with_help.description: You and your shady friend wait for the getaway car, but the police are stalling. They eventually storm the bank and arrest you.

wait_car_alone.description: You wait for the getaway car, but the police are stalling. They eventually storm the bank and arrest you.

wait_car_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend wait for the getaway car, but the police are stalling. They eventually storm the bank and arrest you.

wait_car_unarmed_alone.description: You wait for the getaway car, but the police are stalling. They eventually storm the bank and arrest you.

escape_hostage_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to escape with the hostage, but the police catch up to you. In the chaos, the hostage is injured, and you're arrested.

escape_hostage_alone.description: You try to escape with the hostage, but the police catch up to you. In the chaos, the hostage is injured, and you're arrested.

escape_hostage_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to escape with the hostage, but the police catch up to you. In the chaos, the hostage is injured, and you're arrested.

escape_hostage_unarmed_alone.description: You try to escape with the hostage, but the police catch up to you. In the chaos, the hostage is injured, and you're arrested.

move_exit_with_help.description: You and your shady friend keep moving towards the exit, but the police block your way. In the ensuing standoff, you're shot and captured.

move_exit_alone.description: You keep moving towards the exit, but the police block your way. In the ensuing standoff, you're shot and captured.

move_exit_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend keep moving towards the exit, but the police block your way. In the ensuing standoff, you're captured.

move_exit_unarmed_alone.description: You keep moving towards the exit, but the police block your way. In the ensuing standoff, you're captured.

negotiate_police_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to negotiate with the police, but they don't trust you. The standoff ends with your arrest.

negotiate_police_alone.description: You try to negotiate with the police, but they don't trust you. The standoff ends with your arrest.

negotiate_police_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to negotiate with the police, but they don't trust you. The standoff ends with your arrest.

negotiate_police_unarmed_alone.description: You try to negotiate with the police, but they don't trust you. The standoff ends with your arrest.

game_over.description: The choices you've made have led you to this moment. Reflecting on your decisions, you realize that every action has consequences. This is the end of the path you've chosen.

plan_heist.description: You meticulously plan the heist, covering every detail from entry to escape. You feel ready to impress her with your daring move.

panic_flee_with_help.description: You and your shady friend panic and decide to flee the bank. The plan falls apart and you find yourself on the run.

panic_flee_alone.description: You panic and decide to flee the bank alone. The plan falls apart and you find yourself on the run.

panic_flee_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend panic and decide to flee the bank unarmed. The plan falls apart and you find yourself on the run.

reason_tellers_with_help.description: You and your shady friend try to reason with the tellers, hoping to get the money without violence.

panic_flee_unarmed_alone.description: You panic and decide to flee the bank unarmed and alone. The plan falls apart and you find yourself on the run.

reason_tellers_alone.description: You try to reason with the tellers, hoping to get the money without violence.

take_hostage_critical_with_help.description: You and your shady friend take a hostage, escalating the situation critically.

take_hostage_critical_alone.description: You take a hostage, escalating the situation critically.

take_hostage_unarmed_critical_with_help.description: You and your shady friend take a hostage, escalating the situation critically even though you are unarmed.

take_hostage_unarmed_critical_alone.description: You take a hostage, escalating the situation critically even though you are unarmed.

demand_money_with_help.description: You and your shady friend demand money with the hostage as leverage. The bank staff is terrified and complies, but the situation is tense.

demand_money_alone.description: You demand money with the hostage as leverage. The bank staff is terrified and complies, but the situation is tense.

demand_money_unarmed_with_help.description: You and your shady friend demand money with the hostage as leverage, even though you're unarmed. The bank staff is terrified and complies, but the situation is tense.

demand_money_unarmed_alone.description: You demand money with the hostage as leverage, even though you're unarmed. The bank staff is terrified and complies, but the situation is tense.
